835CfgTemplate.archivedPath: <# UNC Path to where the original file is to be moved (archived).#>
835CfgTemplate.extractedPath: <# UNC Path to where the extracted entries are to be written.#>
835CfgTemplate.processedPath: <# UNC Path to where the remaining entries are to be written.#>
835CfgTemplate.archiveSource: <# Boolean if original is to be archived.#>
